annotations.text: Information for managing the exchange of lectures.
The identifier of the lecture being replaced
The identifier of the replacing lecture.
Represents the result of a lecture exchange.
True indicates that the lectures were successfully exchanged, false that they could not be exchanged.
The identifier of the lecturer holding the lecture
The name of the lecturer reading the lecture
The place where the lecture takes places
The number of subscriptions for the lecture

annotations.text: The timetable of a student for the current day
